scc_rules.description: Check whether Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) has no public gateways attached
scc_rules.ignore_reason: Need public network access to collect liberty operator images

scc_rules.description: Check whether multifactor authentication (MFA) is enabled at the account level
scc_rules.ignore_reason: This is an account based rule, so unrelated to this module itself

scc_rules.description: Check whether permissions for API key creation are limited and configured in IAM settings for the account owner
scc_rules.ignore_reason: This is an account based rule, so unrelated to this module itself

scc_rules.description: Check whether permissions for service ID creation are limited and configured in IAM settings for the account owner
scc_rules.ignore_reason: This is an account based rule, so unrelated to this module itself
